We are on the Gas Safe register

Passing the tests in the high 90%'s, you can be sure you have an engineer of the highest knowledge at hand. Please click the following link to see our profile on the Gase Safe register.

Find us on Checkatrade

We are proud members of Checkatrade. This means that we have agreed to be monitored, vetted and assessed by them, as well as seeing feedback left on there from our customers.
